creator: marco.dongu@softeco.it
text:
When JSVGCanvas loads a DOM or refresh itself, the window application minimizes!
The JSVGCanvas is contained into an JInternalFrame component and it seems that,
at any refresh of JSVGCanvas object, the DesktopPane takes a null preferred size.
The problem is only arrived with java SDK version superior at 1.3.1.
With versions below 1.3.0 the problem doesn't exixt.
Thank you for your attention...

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
This should be fixed in current CVS Batik (I believe :).
If you find this not to be the case please reopen with a small sample 
application.
